item.title: Gotta start somewhere..
item.description:
Introduction

Hey, everyone! This is the first post of what I hope will be a math blog!

I think I’ll post about LEAN4, proof writing, interesting problems, etc… Maybe, I’ll post a bit about my Grad School applications, when that time coems around.

Stick around for cool math stuff and subscribe!

item.title: About Me
item.description:
Who’s this guy?

I am Dattabhasvant Ghadiyaram (/dət̪t̪ɐbʱɑːs̪ʋənt̪ ɡʱəɖiːɑːrəm/). I am from Bangalore, India. I am doing my Bachelore of Science at IISc Bangalore, with a major in Mathematics. My primary interests are Math-AI, automated theorem proving, formal mathematics, complex analysis and proabability theory.
